channel.title: [508] object tele
channel.description:
i made a object in my home that teleport me to a place but if use the object and do ::home ... my object is gone i logout and in ... and its back i use again and do ::home ... its again gone
what my problem?
frame.java [code]createObject(p, 2544, 0, 3213, 3434, 1, 10);[/code]
objectoption1.java [code]case 2544: p.teleportTo(2962, 9650, 2, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to the Fight Arena !!!"); break;[/code]
can anyone help me plz?
